Uses of Class
window.WindowParameters

  • Packages that use WindowParameters 
    Package Description
    core  
    window  

    • Uses of WindowParameters in core

      Methods in core with parameters of type WindowParameters 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void GameLoop.initialize(WindowParameters parameters)
      Initializes the engine including the windowing system, the input handling, the rendering pipeline and much more.
      private static void GameLoop.initializeWindowAndInput(WindowParameters parameters)
      Initializes the window and the input system.

    • Uses of WindowParameters in window

      Methods in window with parameters of type WindowParameters 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void Window.initialize(WindowParameters parameters)
      Initializes the Window based on the data of Settings and the given parameters.
